title: Halloween (1978)
description: A classic slasher film where Michael Myers terrorizes a small town on Halloween night.

title: Hocus Pocus
description: Three witches are resurrected in Salem, Massachusetts, and wreak havoc on Halloween night.

title: The Exorcist
description: A chilling story about the demonic possession of a young girl and the exorcism performed to save her.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description: Freddy Krueger haunts the dreams of teenagers in this terrifying slasher film.

title: Beetlejuice
description: A dark comedy about a recently deceased couple who hire a mischievous ghost to scare away the new owners of their house.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil presence drives the father to madness.

title: Scream
description: A group of teenagers is targeted by a masked killer who follows the rules of horror movies.

title: The Addams Family
description: A quirky, spooky family navigates life in a world that doesn't understand them.

title: Coraline
description: A young girl discovers a parallel world that seems better than her own, but dark secrets lurk beneath the surface.

title: The Witch
description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
